extends java.lang.Object
    Util class for the annotators containing lookup functions for JML comments

      • collectPreviousComments

        public static java.util.ArrayList<com.intellij.psi.PsiComment> collectPreviousComments​(com.intellij.psi.PsiComment myComment,
                                                                                       boolean alsoAddMyself)
        Generates a list of all comments that come before the current comment
        Parameters:
        myComment - the comment to look backwards from
        alsoAddMyself - whether myComment should be included in the resulting list
        Returns:
        a list of all comments that come before the current comment, possible including myComment as well

      • doPrevCommentsContain

        public static boolean doPrevCommentsContain​(com.intellij.psi.PsiElement element,
                                            java.lang.String regex,
                                            boolean doNotCountMyself,
                                            boolean alsoSearchMyOwnComment)
        Checks whether the previous comments matches the regex
        Parameters:
        element - the element from which to start the search
        regex - the regex that should be matched
        doNotCountMyself - if true, at least 2 occurrences need to be found instead of 1
        alsoSearchMyOwnComment - if true, the current comment is included in the search
        Returns:
        true if the regex could be matched in the previous comments

      • doPrevInvariantModifiersContain

        public static boolean doPrevInvariantModifiersContain​(com.intellij.psi.PsiElement element,
                                                      com.intellij.psi.tree.TokenSet tokens)
        Checks whether the regex can be matched in comment containing an invariant
        Parameters:
        element - the element to search
        tokens - the tokens out of which one needs to match with the token-type of the modifier
        Returns:
        true if the regex could be matched in the comment

      • doLinkedCommentsContain

        public static boolean doLinkedCommentsContain​(@NotNull
                                              @NotNull com.intellij.psi.PsiElement element,
                                              java.lang.String regex,
                                              boolean doNotCountMyself)
        Checks whether the current, previous or next comments matches the regex
        Parameters:
        element - the element from which to start the search
        regex - the regex that should be matched
        doNotCountMyself - if true, at least 2 occurrences need to be found instead of 1
        Returns:
        true if the regex could be matched across the comments

      • countTextMatchesAcrossComments

        private static int countTextMatchesAcrossComments​(@NotNull
                                                  @NotNull java.util.ArrayList<com.intellij.psi.PsiComment> comments,
                                                  java.lang.String regex,
                                                  int maxCount)
        Counts the amount of matches with the regex across the comments in the list
        Parameters:
        comments - the list of comments to search in
        regex - the regex that should be matched
        maxCount - how many matches should be found to stop the search sooner
        Returns:
        the number of matches found

      • findFirstModifierInInvariant

        public static com.intellij.psi.PsiElement findFirstModifierInInvariant​(JMLModifiers modifiers,
                                                                       com.intellij.psi.tree.TokenSet tokens)
        Finds the first modifier that has a certain token type
        Parameters:
        modifiers - the list of modifiers
        tokens - the tokens out of which one needs to match with the token-type of the modifier
        Returns:
        a matching modifier, or null if it could not be found
